level.text: 3405.1 An applicant who holds a current and valid certification issued byCARB, submits to the Board satisfactory evidence of such certification, andeets the requirements as set forth in this chapter and the Act, shall beicensed if the applicant:
Holds a current and valid registration as an architect issued by aegistration authority of the United States or Canada, and submits to the Boardatisfactory evidence of such registration;

Files an application with the Board, upon a form prescribed by the Board,ontaining such information concerning the applicant as the Board considersertinent, and is deemed satisfactory by the Board; and
Has paid the required fees to the District.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 42 DCR 7266, 7270 (Dec. 29,1995); Finalulemaking published at 55 DCR 5454, 5458 (May 9, 2008).
